context: Gartner remains the undisputed industry giant with over $4.2 billion in annual revenue and 17,000+ employees. Approximately 70% of revenue comes from end-user clients (technology buyers). The competitive landscape includes The Big Three (FIGs), specialized technology service firms like TSIA, consulting giants, and peer review platforms offering different engagement models.

competitors.name: Forrester Research
competitors.notes: Strongest competitor; Forrester Wave evaluations and Total Economic Impact studies; focus on customer experience, product leaders, IT strategists; helps de-risk major technology selections

competitors.name: IDC (International Data Corporation)
competitors.notes: Deep coverage of IT spending, hardware, software markets; benchmark source for market sizing and forecasts; IDC MarketScape vendor assessments; specialized in IT infrastructure, telecom, AI, IoT

competitors.name: 451 Research
competitors.notes: Detailed reports and market data in cloud, data management, information security; known for tracking emerging technology developments and innovation impact

competitors.name: Omdia
competitors.notes: Part of Informa Tech; broad research across telecom, media, technology; integrates sector knowledge with market data and vendor analysis; focused on networks, devices, digital services

competitors.name: Everest Group
competitors.notes: Dedicated focus on digital transformation and technology services; differentiates by specialization in digital technology navigation

competitors.name: TSIA
competitors.notes: Strategically focused alternative designed for technology and services industry; operational and financial realities of tech-driven businesses; specialized performance frameworks

competitors.name: Info-Tech Research Group
competitors.notes: IT research and advisory providing strategic decision support for CIOs and IT leaders

competitors.name: Frost & Sullivan
competitors.notes: Market research and analysis with growth strategy consulting across technology sectors

competitors.name: McKinsey & Company
competitors.notes: High-touch consulting with project-based engagement rather than subscription research; strategic IT and digital transformation

competitors.name: Boston Consulting Group
competitors.notes: Strategic advisory services for technology and digital initiatives

competitors.name: Bain & Company
competitors.notes: Management consulting competing in technology strategy and implementation

competitors.name: Deloitte
competitors.notes: Big Four firm with extensive technology and digital transformation expertise; consulting arm major competitor

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Technology consulting and digital transformation services

competitors.name: G2
competitors.notes: Peer-driven software insights offering different business model from traditional subscription research
